description: Update a monitor to add or remove local or remote resources.

parameters.name: localResourcesToAdd
parameters.description: The local resources to add, as an array of resources with identifiers and types. (dict) --- A local resource is the host where the agent is installed. Local resources can be a a subnet, a VPC, or an Availability Zone. The type of the local resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone or AWS::EC2::Subnet. The identifier of the local resource, such as an ARN.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of the local resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone or AWS::EC2::Subnet.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the local resource, such as an ARN.

parameters.name: localResourcesToRemove
parameters.description: The local resources to remove, as an array of resources with identifiers and types. (dict) --- A local resource is the host where the agent is installed. Local resources can be a a subnet, a VPC, or an Availability Zone. The type of the local resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone or AWS::EC2::Subnet. The identifier of the local resource, such as an ARN.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of the local resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone or AWS::EC2::Subnet.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the local resource, such as an ARN.

parameters.name: remoteResourcesToAdd
parameters.description: The remove resources to add, as an array of resources with identifiers and types. (dict) --- A remote resource is the other endpoint in a network flow. That is, one endpoint is the local resource and the other is the remote resource. Remote resources can be a a subnet, a VPC, an Availability Zone, or an Amazon Web Services service. The type of the remote resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone, AWS::EC2::Subnet, or AWS::AWSService. The identifier of the remote resource, such as an ARN.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of the remote resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone, AWS::EC2::Subnet, or AWS::AWSService.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the remote resource, such as an ARN.

parameters.name: remoteResourcesToRemove
parameters.description: The remove resources to remove, as an array of resources with identifiers and types. (dict) --- A remote resource is the other endpoint in a network flow. That is, one endpoint is the local resource and the other is the remote resource. Remote resources can be a a subnet, a VPC, an Availability Zone, or an Amazon Web Services service. The type of the remote resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone, AWS::EC2::Subnet, or AWS::AWSService. The identifier of the remote resource, such as an ARN.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of the remote resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone, AWS::EC2::Subnet, or AWS::AWSService.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the remote resource, such as an ARN.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive string of up to 64 ASCII characters that you specify to make an idempotent API request. Don't reuse the same client token for other API requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: monitorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor.

nested_items.name: monitorStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a monitor. The status can be one of the following.
PENDING: The monitor is in the process of being created.
ERROR: Monitor creation failed due to an error.
DELETING: The monitor is in the process of being deleted.

nested_items.name: localResources
nested_items.description: The local resources updated for a monitor, as an array of resources with identifiers and types.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the local resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone or AWS::EC2::Subnet.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the local resource, such as an ARN.

nested_items.name: remoteResources
nested_items.description: The remote resources updated for a monitor, as an array of resources with identifiers and types.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the remote resource. Valid values are AWS::EC2::VPC AWS::AvailabilityZone, AWS::EC2::Subnet, or AWS::AWSService.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the remote resource, such as an ARN.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the monitor was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The last date and time that the monitor was modified.
